noMealsDescription: You can start by adding a meal using the button below
noIngredientsDescription: You can start by adding ingredients using the button below
noFiltersResultsFound: No results found for the selected filters
tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your filters and try again
description: Enter the details to create a new dish, including ingredients, portion size and nutritional values. This information will help accurately include the dish.
noIngredietnsFoundDescription: Try adjusting your query and try again
firstInfoForSearchIngredient: Before searching for ingredients, select the amount and unit of measurement, as they cannot be changed later. If you do not specify anything, the system will automatically assign 100 as the amount and 'g' (grams) as the unit of measurement.
secondInfoForSearchIngredient: Please include one specific ingredient in your query, such as 'Milk 2.5%' or 'Cucumber', and write in proper English. Avoid multiple ingredients in a single query to ensure accurate search results.
lastInfoForSearchIngredient: If everything looks logical and you haven't noticed any mistakes, click the green checkmark button. If you notice any mistakes, click the red trash button.
searchIngredientFromDatabaseFirstInfoTex: Search for the ingredient in your personal database. Make sure your query is clear and precise.
searchIngredientFromDatabaseLastInfoText: Once you find the ingredient you are looking for, enter the desired quantity and press the green button with a checkmark to confirm your selection and allow the system to perform accurate calculations.
info: Please manually calculate and input the nutritional information (calories, carbs, fat, protein) based on the amount you specified.
addIngredientManuallyFirstInfoText: The added ingredient will be saved in your personal ingredient database with the nutritional values ​​provided. This database will allow you to easily access and use the ingredients you created in other recipes or calculations. We recommend using accurate and clear ingredient names.
addIngredientManuallySecondInfoText: Select a unit of measurement for the ingredient. Quantity is already set to (100)  and cannot be changed.
addIngredientManuallyThirdInfoText: Enter all the nutrients listed on the product packaging, based on the amount per 100g. or 100ml.
addIngredientManuallyLastInfoText: Enter the amount of this ingredient you will use in the current dish.
deleteIngredientDescription: If you proceed, the ingredient will be removed from your database permanently. This action will affect all meals or recipes that use this ingredient, as the ingredient's data will no longer be available.
deleteMealDescription: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this meal? This action cannot be undone, and the meal will be removed from your records.

errors.titleMaxLength: Title must be less than {{count}} characters
errors.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than {{count}} characters
errors.filesIsTooLarge: File is too large. Max size is 5MB
errors.noSearchResultsDescription: Try adjusting your query and try again
